books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A sequel, about race and inheritance, to “A Time to Kill.”
books.name: SYCAMORE ROW

books.author: by Clive Cussler with Jack Du Brul
books.description: Juan Cabrillo and the crew of the Oregon probe the disappearance of an American destroyer in 1943.
books.name: MIRAGE

books.author: by Orson Scott Card
books.description: Government agencies breed child geniuses and train them as soldiers. Originally published in 1985; now a movie.
books.name: ENDER'S GAME

books.author: by Nora Roberts
books.description: In the first book of the Cousins O'Dwyer trilogy, Iona Sheehan moves to Ireland to investigate her family's history.
books.name: DARK WITCH

books.author: by J. A. Redmerski
books.description: A sequel to "The Edge of Never" finds Camryn and Andrew about to embark on a new journey to save their relationship.
books.name: THE EDGE OF ALWAYS

books.author: by Amy Tan
books.description: The author of “The Joy Luck Club” follows mother and daughter courtesans over four decades.
books.name: THE VALLEY OF AMAZEMENT

books.author: by Katy Evans
books.description: In this sequel to "Real," Brooke Dumas strives to overcome difficulties difficulties in her relationship with a star of the underground fighting circuit.
books.name: MINE

books.author: by Donna Tartt
books.description: A painting smuggled out of the Metropolitan Museum of Art after a bombing becomes a boy’s prize, guilt and burden.
books.name: THE GOLDFINCH

books.author: by Fannie Flagg
books.description: A Southern woman’s search for the secrets of her mother’s past leads her to a gas station run by four girls in the Midwest during World War II.
books.name: THE ALL-GIRL FILLING STATION'S LAST REUNION

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: A woman’s life is upended when she discovers a letter from her husband she was not meant to read.
books.name: THE HUSBAND'S SECRET

books.author: by Alexander McCall Smith
books.description: The 14th installment of the No. 1 Ladies’ Detective Agency series.
books.name: THE MINOR ADJUSTMENT BEAUTY SALON

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: The lives of two couples converge unexpectedly.
books.name: THE LONGEST RIDE

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: Now grown up, Dan, the boy with psycho-intuitive powers in “The Shining,” helps another child with a spectacular gift.
books.name: DOCTOR SLEEP

books.author: by Dean Koontz
books.description: A short story introducing Addison Goodheart, the protagonist of Koontz's forthcoming novel, "Innocence."
books.name: WILDERNESS

books.author: by George R. R. Martin
books.description: After a colossal battle, the Seven Kingdoms face new threats; Book 5 of “A Song of Ice and Fire.”
books.name: A DANCE WITH DRAGONS
